value.title: Wednesday with DAX in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI DAX Series. Every Wednesday, we will talk about different DAX functions.

topItems.title: DAX Functions Overview - Date and Time Function in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Welcome to my new series ‚Äì ‚ÄúWednesday with DAX‚Äù. This is the first video of this series. The first episode covers all Date and Time functions used in Power BI In this video, we will talk about Date and Time functions in Power BI. We will discuss about most useful date and time functions in Power BI.
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rVxCZNWpbBU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: DAX for Power BI - Calculate Cumulative Sum (Running Total) of Count in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: The cumulative total is also known as Running total and during this video, we will talk about how we can calculate a cumulative sum for request count using Power BI Dax measure in Power BI.  During this session, we will cover the following things: ‚Ä¢ Real-life example where we need Cumulative Sum 00:21
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8wjYWiZ7gpQ" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: DAX for Power BI - Calculate Cumulative Sum (Running Total) of Count in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: The cumulative total is also known as Running total and during this video, we will talk about how we can calculate a cumulative sum for request count using Power BI Dax measure in Power BI.  During this session, we will cover the following things: ‚Ä¢ Real-life example where we need Cumulative Sum 00:21
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8wjYWiZ7gpQ" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: After Union Two tables, data goes to the wrong column with Power BI DAX?
topItems.excerpt: Most of us have used Union DAX expression in Power BI. Basically union, appends rows from both the table which are common. In Power BI, sometimes, when we perform Union operation, the combined data have some inconsistent mechanism, meaning one column's data merged with another column. The main reason

value.title: Get started with Power BI Paginated Reports
value.excerpt: Patrick walks you through how to create your first Paginated Report for Power BI, Power BI Report Server or SQL Server Reporting Services.

topItems.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Data source, Dataset and parameters
topItems.excerpt: Paginated reports in Power BI are now available. Patrick walks you through how to get started with a paginated report using Report Builder. In this video, he starts off with how to create an embedded data source, a dataset, and parameters.  To download Report Builder, check out this link: https://guyinacu.be/reportbuilder

topItems.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Visualizing Data
topItems.excerpt: Paginated reports in Power BI are now available. Now that you have data, Patrick walks you through how to build a matrix visual within the report. value.title: Learn all about Power BI Aggregations
value.excerpt: Power BI aggregations are for more than just large data models! In this series, Patrick looks at the different aspects of Power BI aggregations.

topItems.title: The How and Why of Power BI Aggregations
topItems.excerpt: Learn the how and why Power BI Aggregations can help your data model be more efficient. This video is part of a Power BI Aggregations series. value.excerpt: DAX Studio is the tool for data model tuning.

topItems.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Introduction to DAX Studio - By Darren Gosbell
topItems.excerpt: DAX Studio is the tool for data model tuning.  Darren Gosbell the creator of DAX Studio will be giving a live demo of his tool.
